# Build the project

## Requirements

You will need [reference](https://docs.docker.com/)

## Installation

```sh
git clone https://github.com/ostis-apps/geometry.ostis # this avoids problems on Windows filesystems
cd geometry.ostis
```

## Build

  ```sh
  ./prepare.sh
  ```

## ðŸš€ Run

  ```sh
  ./run_script
  ```

  This command will launch some interface.
